sentences.english: The farmer turns up a human skull while ploughs the field.

sentences.english: Xu's skull was seriously fractured and she fell into a deep coma after the accident.

sentences.english: In this article, the author discussed the strength and rigidity of the skull bones from the view of mechanics and bionics.

sentences.english: Between skull's bone seam I has two big spot slits in the baby top of the head.

sentences.english: Another male skull sported three small rectangular openings in the back of the head.

sentences.english: The latter is usually accompanied by multiple lytic lesions of the skull.
sentences.chinese: 后者通常伴有颅骨多发性囊性病变。

sentences.english: Prognosis of SEG is good except invading other organs.
sentences.chinese: 只要不侵犯颅骨以外器官，SEG预后良好。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a new method of cranioplasty to repair large-format bone defect.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求一种新的大面积颅骨缺损的修复方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of cranioplasty with titanium mesh.
